downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project gives users the ability to manage their Project Operations project plans in the familiar project management tool, Microsoft Project. Compatible with D365 for Project Operations 4.88+

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project x86.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/c/d/1cddcf97-f26c-45d6-93d6-a9adf3a98fc2/Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project x86.msi

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project x64.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/c/d/1cddcf97-f26c-45d6-93d6-a9adf3a98fc2/Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project x64.msi

detailsSection:
The Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project lets users manage their Project Operations project plans in Microsoft Project, a project management tool. From the add-in, users can read and publish project plans to Project Operations at the click of a button.
  • Quickly and easily import project plans from Project Operations into Microsoft Project.
  • Publish project plans to Project Operations.
  • Create project teams inside Project Operations from Microsoft Project.
  • Find Project Operations resources and assign them to project plans from Microsoft Project.
For versions of Project Service Automation (V3.X), download the add-in from Microsoft Download Center.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project x86.msi
Microsoft Dynamics 365 Project Operations Add-in for Microsoft Project x64.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
• Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Microsoft Project Professional 2016
  • A working Dynamics 365 Project Operations implementation, version 4.88+
installInstructionSection:
Important! If you install the 32-bit version of Microsoft Project, you must use the 32-bit version of the add-in. If you install the 64-bit version of Microsoft Project, you must use the 64-bit version of the add-in.
  1. Double-click the .msi file to start the Setup wizard.
  2. Click Next.
  3. Accept the license agreement, and then click Next.
  4. Click Install.
  5. Click Finish.
After successful completion, open Microsoft Project and a new Project Operations tab is displayed on the ribbon.
To install this update rollup, do one of the following:
  • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
  • To save the download to your computer for installation later, click Save.
  • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
